hero.title: MOONHAUS
hero.subtitle: Where creativity and diversity flourish in Valencia
hero.description: At Moonhaus, we reinvent coworking so that mothers, fathers, creatives and professionals of all backgrounds can find an inclusive, artistic space full of opportunities. Coming soon. Reserve your spot today!
hero.cta: I want to be among the first

why.title: Why Moonhaus?
why.description: Looking for more than just a desk? Moonhaus is a disruptive coworking space where equality, collaboration, and respect are everyday values. Here, inclusion is real: men, women, LGBTQ+ individuals, families, artists, and entrepreneurs share an open and creative environment.
why.cta: Discover how we can enhance your talent

spaces.title: Explore Our Spaces
spaces.subtitle: Each space is designed to inspire, connect, and adapt to your creative and professional needs.
spaces.cta: Request information on availability and pricing

detail1.title: Meeting room and mixed arts workshop
detail1.description: Capacity: 8 people. Modern table, 8 chairs of different heights, 8 lockers, storage, wifi.

detail2.title: Exclusive workshops
detail2.description: Epoxy resin, architecture for children, modeling, illustration, summer workshops and more.

detail1.title: Private micro-office for 1 person
detail1.description: Executive chair, desk, mini-fridge, secure drawer, fiscal address, wifi.

detail2.title: Private and professional environment
detail2.description: Perfect for independent professionals who need concentration and privacy.

detail1.title: Flexible office for 2 people
detail1.description: Large desk, mini-fridge with drinks, secure drawer, fiscal address, wifi.

detail2.title: Collaborative space
detail2.description: Ideal for small teams or for those who work with a partner.

detail1.title: Main hall for cultural events
detail1.description: Versatile space for exhibitions, group workshops and community activities.

detail2.title: Exclusive weekend rental
detail2.description: Perfect for private events, presentations and special celebrations.

team.title: Three entrepreneurs, three stories, one vision

natalia.name: Natalia
natalia.description: Colombian architect, convinced that art and equality transform communities.

camilo.name: Camilo
camilo.description: Canadian, management expert and passionate about connecting people and cultures.

doriam.name: Doriam
doriam.description: Designer and creative, a symbol of those who break barriers in the business world.

team.footer: Together they have created Moonhaus: a space where differences add up and ideas come to life.

community.title: Community & Moonhaus Experience
community.subtitle: At Moonhaus, the experience goes beyond physical space.
features: Workshops and activities for all ages
Support for mothers, fathers, creatives and professionals from all sectors

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.intro: Ready to join Valencia's most innovative creative community? Let's talk about how Moonhaus can transform your work experience.

seo.title: Contact - Moonhaus Valencia | Reserve your Coworking Space in Ruzafa
seo.description: Contact Moonhaus Valencia to reserve your inclusive coworking space in Ruzafa. Creative spaces for professionals, families and artists. Join our community!

form.messagePlaceholder: What type of space are you looking for? What's your project about? How can Moonhaus help you grow?
form.successMessage: Thank you! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
form.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact us directly.

whatsapp.redirect: Great! I'm redirecting you to WhatsApp where our team will assist you personally. See you soon! üöÄ

liveMoonhaus.title: Experience Moonhaus: Imagine your day here
liveMoonhaus.description: Imagine arriving at a space where you can be yourself, develop your project, share ideas and grow surrounded by people who understand and support you.
liveMoonhaus.question: Are you a freelancer, parent, artist, digital nomad, or simply looking for a respectful and vibrant environment?
